data.label: Unstoppable
data.description: Displayed unmatched performance and brilliant strategy, leading the team to victory.

data.label: Leader
data.description: Made the perfect decisions and strategies, leading the team to victory.

data.label: Victor
data.description: Contributed significantly in the early and mid-game, securing the win.

data.label: Devoted
data.description: Displayed exemplary effort and dedication for victory, resulting in a positive outcome.

data.label: Late bloomer
data.description: Demonstrated increasingly better performance over time, leading to a victory.

data.label: Resilient
data.description: Demonstrated strength and perseverance in overcoming difficult situations.

data.label: Average
data.description: Played along with the game flow.

data.label: Downfall
data.description: Started off well, but performance weakened over time.

data.label: Struggle
data.description: Faced challenges and struggled to perform as desired.

data.label: Innocent
data.description: Demonstrated the best possible play a player could perform.

data.label: Unlucky
data.description: Displayed good performance but was unlucky.

data.label: Slow starter
data.description: Demonstrated consistent growth, but didn't have enough time.

data.label: Unyielding
data.description: Displayed unyielding determination and never gave up.
